skins.selfIntroduction: I am none other than Graf Zeppelin, the first carrier of the Iron Blood! Heh. Don't be so surprised. The next era of naval warfare will definitely be decided by aircraft, and I will stand as its most brightly shining star! So, let me go back! ...Huh, I can't? ...Taste my wrath!!
skins.acquisition: State your name! And this location! I see now... you¡¯re also one of those goons conspiring against me! I¡¯ll let you know, I am Graf Zeppelin, the one destined to become the first carrier of the Iron Blood! To think that you¡¯d carry me off when I was distracted... taste my wrath!
skins.login: Where did you suddenly run off to?! Taste my wrath!
skins.details: Why are there other Iron Bloods here, and why are they so... big? It's a bit scary...
skins.secretaryIdle1: *sniffle* ... *sniffle*... Waaah... Why are you still working and ignoring me?! Taste my wrath!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmph. No matter how hard you try, I will never yield to you! ...Desserts? Gimme...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmm... this should go here... No, no, maybe like this...? Hey! Wh-what are you doing! I didn't ask for your help!
skins.secretaryIdle4: I like high places! That way, I can see really far!
skins.secretaryIdle5: Despair and hatred mean nothing to me! I believe that as long as you don't give up, you can make any dream come true!
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't just randomly touch me! Taste my wrath!!
